## Description {#details}

Helper type for serializing Errors.

llvm::Errors are move-only, and not inspectable except by consuming them. This makes them unsuitable for direct serialization via <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/shared/spsserializationtraits">SPSSerializationTraits</a>, which needs to inspect values twice (once to determine the amount of space to reserve, and then again to serialize).

The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/orc/shared/detail/spsserializableerror">SPSSerializableError</a> type is a helper that can be constructed from an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a>, but inspected more than once.
